title: Arrival at train station
body: User arrives by Uber, pays using crypto wallet.

title: Snack time
body: Go to snack kiosk, purchase bakery products and a juice, pay by contact-less credit card.

title: Purchase train ticket
body: Connect to free wifi from station, use fast-track train ticket service to buy, pay via wallet.

title: Journey (2h)
body: Connect to on-train wifi, get realtime push notifications announcing delays.
